net.munki.javabot.management

Interface BotUserManagerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultBotUserManager

    public interface BotUserManagerInterface
    Interface for all Bot User Managers. You may decide to implement the user file configuration using XML or Properties for example.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canDeop(ChannelUser channelUser, Channel channel)
      Determines whether or not the given user is allowed to deop.
      boolean canDevoice(ChannelUser channelUser, Channel channel)
      Determines whether or not the given user is allowed to devoice.

      Determines whether or not the given user is allowed to op.
      boolean canVoice(ChannelUser channelUser, Channel channel)
      Determines whether or not the given user is allowed to voice.

    • Method Detail

      • canOp

        boolean canOp(ChannelUser channelUser,
            Channel channel)
        Determines whether or not the given user is allowed to op.
        Parameters:
        channelUser - The user trying to op someone through the bot.
        channel - The channel on which the op has been requested.
        Returns:
        True if op is allowed, otherwise false.

      • canDeop

        Determines whether or not the given user is allowed to deop.
        Parameters:
        channelUser - The user trying to deop someone through the bot.
        channel - The channel on which the deop has been requested.
        Returns:
        True if deop is allowed, otherwise false.

      • canVoice

        boolean canVoice(ChannelUser channelUser,
               Channel channel)
        Determines whether or not the given user is allowed to voice.
        Parameters:
        channelUser - The user trying to voice someone through the bot.
        channel - The channel on which the voice has been requested.
        Returns:
        True if voice is allowed, otherwise false.

        Parameters:

        channel - The channel on which the devoice has been requested.
